alert.note: Alert for Newberry; Union (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 30 at 5:03AM EDT until May 01 at 9:12PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Columbia affecting Lexington and Richland Counties. Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting Calhoun and Richland Counties. Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Calhoun, Lexington and Richland Counties. Saluda River At Chappells affecting Saluda, Newberry and Greenwood Counties. Enoree River At Whitmire affecting Union and Newberry Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Enoree River At Whitmire. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, River bottomland near and downstream from Whitmire become flooded. At 28.0 feet, The Coleman Aughtry Road along the river becomes flooded. Do not drive into flooded roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 27.3 feet. - Forecast...The river has crested. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - http://www.floodsafety.noaa.gov &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and take action if necessary. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
